level.heading: PROHIBITION ON CERTAIN FEE-RELATED PRACTICES (ยง 21-1010) A retail establishment shall not assume or absorb, or refund to the customer,he disposable carryout bag fee. A retail establishment shall not advertise or hold out or state to the public oro a customer, directly or indirectly, that the reimbursement of the disposablearryout bag fee or any part of the fee to be collected by the retailstablishment will be assumed or absorbed by the retail establishment orefunded to the customer. Source: Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 7208, 7213 (August 13, 2010).
